string.text:
Developed by FN America in the early 2010s, the FN SCAR-12 takes the ergonomics and reliability of the SCAR platform and goes all in on close range firepower by turning it into a 12 guage shotgun.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] origin: %c[ui_gray_2]USA
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]FN America
